ProteinName	Spexin (NPQ) (Neuropeptide Q) (Spexin hormone) [Cleaved into: Spexin-1; Spexin-2 (NPQ 53-70)]
GeneName	SPX C12orf39
Length	116
Function	Plays a role as a central modulator of cardiovascular and renal function and nociception. Also plays a role in energy metabolism and storage. Inhibits adrenocortical cell proliferation with minor stimulation on corticosteroid release (By similarity).
